remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create an delegate for an , you identify the method that will handle the event. 時 （當資料繫結） 之後產生的項目事件通知的處理常式。The notifies the handler when an item event is generated (after data binding). 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除委派，否則每次發生事件時都會呼叫事件處理常式。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 若要執行複雜資料繫結，並設定中的值，您可以使用這個處理常式物件。You can use this handler to do complex data binding and to set values in the object.
